title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 40 - Marine Fish
content:

§ 40.1 - Marine fish-open seasons, size and catch limits
§ 40.2 - Atlantic salmon
§ 40.3 - Fish unintentionally taken

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301, 11-0303, 11-0305, 11-0306, 11-0315, 11-0317, 11-0319, 11-1301, 11-1303, 11-1305, 11-1501, 11-1503, 11-1505, 13-0105, 13-0329, 13-0338, 13-0339, 13-0339-a, 13-0340-a, 13-0340-b, 13-0340-c, 13-0340-d, 13-0340-e, 13-0340-f, 13-0342, 13-0371; arts. 11, 13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. § 40.1 - Marine fish-open seasons, size and catch limits
§ 40.2 - Atlantic salmon
§ 40.3 - Fish unintentionally taken
§ 40.4 - Net fishery limits-mesh sizes and gear restrictions
§ 40.5 - Fish pots or traps

§ 40.7 - Renumbered
